Desc.entry: Trevor Page offers comedy talks on the subject of: "What Makes You Laugh?", "What Makes You Laugh Twice?" and "Still Laughing". These include memories of some of the most famous comedians of the Twentieth Century, with insights into comedy drawn from the speaker's own life. Other titles include: "Knives and Vicars", an account of how an often colourful clergy responded to the growth of Sheffield's steel industry; "Christmas Surprise", a humourous look at Christmas experiences drawn in part from the speaker's years as a parish priest. Lunchtime comedy and 'After Dinners' also available. Fee charged.
